attributes.action: Respect the democratic process in Northern Ireland and the wishes of the people in not extending the 1967 Abortion Act to Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We wish to protect preborn children and their mothers from abortion.  The Westminster Parliament must respect the democratic process in Northern Ireland and acknowledge the clear life affirming message sent out from the Northern Ireland Assembly on 22nd October 2007.

We call upon the Prime Minister, Mr Gordon Brown, and the Government to ensure that any legislation regarding abortion in Northern Ireland will be dealt with by the Northern Ireland Assembly only.  

We in Northern Ireland do not take the lives of our preborn children. Women need love and support, not abortion.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
